channel.description:

item.title: Theme Park Studio
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Yes, u can change whatever u want!!!

I already bought mine on the site below, u gonna receive a key for Steam which add u to the alpha/beta and then they gonna add patches, changes, till the complete build.

I also gonna receive a disc later on, with the complete game on it

https://www.themeparkstudio.com/main.html
